hero.title: Your project is ready to launch? Start today with easy steps.
hero.description: From a client looking to execute their project to an engineer or contractor seeking to prove their expertise—Lad brings you together in one marketplace to build projects with reliability and transparency.

features.title: Diverse Features and Endless Possibilities
features.description: A unified platform that enables individuals, companies, and contractors to collaborate and grow.
features.feature1Description: We provide you with a reliable database of contractors in various fields, with ratings and reviews from previous clients to help you choose the best fit for your project.
features.feature2Description: We follow up on project stages and coordinate between the client and the contractor, ensuring clear requirements and deadlines for delivering high-quality work.
features.feature3Description: We help you draft contracts and guarantee the rights of all parties, in addition to managing payment processes in a safe and reliable way.

servicesAndBenefits.title: Our Services & Benefits
servicesAndBenefits.description: Discover how the LAD platform can transform your journey in construction and engineering

smartMatching.title: Smart Project Matching
smartMatching.description: Automatically connects you with the most suitable contractor or engineering office.
smartMatching.label: Services
smartMatching.imageIdea: AI network illustration showing project connected with contractor icons

contractorDirectory.title: Trusted Contractor Directory
contractorDirectory.description: Browse verified profiles with ratings, certifications, and past projects.
contractorDirectory.label: Quality
contractorDirectory.imageIdea: Profile cards or directory illustration with stars/reviews

securePayments.title: Secure & Transparent Payments
securePayments.description: Manage invoices, milestone payments, and progress tracking seamlessly.
securePayments.label: Finance
securePayments.imageIdea: Secure wallet or payment transaction illustration with shield

documentsVerification.title: Document Verification
documentsVerification.description: Upload documents, get automatic verification, and reviewer feedback.
documentsVerification.label: Compliance
documentsVerification.imageIdea: Document stack with checkmarks and shield icon

integratedBOQ.title: Integrated BOQ
integratedBOQ.description: Create and manage Bills of Quantities with auto-calculated totals.
integratedBOQ.label: Productivity
integratedBOQ.imageIdea: Spreadsheet or table illustration with calculator and charts

messagingTracking.title: Messaging & Execution Tracking
messagingTracking.description: Chat, notifications, and activity logs to monitor project progress.
messagingTracking.label: Coordination
messagingTracking.imageIdea: Chat bubbles with progress bar or activity timeline

aboutUs.title: Everything About LAD
aboutUs.description: Our company aims to achieve customer satisfaction where our strategy and policies are the constant pursuit of customer satisfaction in the execution of our projects in terms of quality, deadlines, and during the project implementation stages.

howItWorks.title: How does LAD work ?
howItWorks.description: After creating your user account, you can upload your project details. The site will then match your request with qualified contractors and display the offers submitted to you. You can compare bids and negotiate with contractors.
howItWorks.step1Description: Choose the type of service you need and add your project details with photos and the expected budget.
howItWorks.step2Description: Qualified contractors will submit their competitive and professional offers for your project.
howItWorks.step3Description: Review the offers and previous ratings, then choose the contractor that best fits your needs.
howItWorks.step4Description: Follow the project's execution step by step with contractor ratings and full

browseProjects.title: Browse Projects
browseProjects.name: Ahmed Construction Company for General Construction
browseProjects.description: Experienced contractor with over 15 years of experience in general construction. Specialized in project execution.

appFeatures.title: App Features
appFeatures.description: Browse contractor profiles and ratings to choose the best fit for your project.
appFeatures.feature1Description: Available on all stores and can be downloaded easily
appFeatures.feature3Description: Secure and reliable payment and can be paid easily
appFeatures.feature4Description: Easy browsing with easy use and can review notifications and offers easily

testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals in Construction & Engineering
testimonials.description: LAD brings together contractors, engineers, suppliers, and clients in one place. Here's what professionals are saying about the platform.

testimonial1.quote: Through LAD, I've completed 15 projects worth $2.5M in just 8 months. The platform brought me new clients and increased my profits by 40%. The quality of leads is exceptional.
testimonial1.name: Ahmed Khaled Al-Mutairi

testimonial2.quote: As a freelance architect, LAD completely transformed my career. I secured 8 design projects worth $800K in 6 months. Clients trust the platform, which opens countless doors.
testimonial2.name: Dr. Mona Al-Sayed Al-Otaibi

testimonial3.quote: Thanks to LAD, I expanded from a local supplier to a regional one. My sales increased by 300% and I now have 50+ regular contractors. The platform built me a trusted client network.
testimonial3.name: Hassan Ali Al-Shammari

testimonial4.quote: Building my dream home was a lifelong dream. LAD made it reality in just 18 months. The contractor I chose was professional and the quality exceeded my expectations. I recommend it to everyone.
testimonial4.name: Sara Mohamed Al-Ahmad

testimonial5.quote: Our engineering office secured 12 consultation projects worth $1.8M in one year through LAD. The platform connected us with both government and private sector clients.
testimonial5.name: Eng. Abdullah Al-Naimi

testimonial6.quote: LAD helped me manage a $15M residential complex project with exceptional efficiency. Communication with contractors and suppliers was seamless, and the results were outstanding.
testimonial6.name: Khalid Al-Fahd

testimonial7.quote: As a government employee, LAD provided complete transparency in infrastructure projects. I saved 20% of the budget while ensuring high quality standards.
testimonial7.name: Nora Al-Qahtani

cta.title: New Opportunities and Successful Projects in Construction Await You

whoItsFor.title: LAD Platform for Everyone
whoItsFor.subtitle: Discover how LAD can transform your journey in construction and engineering, whether you're seeking services or providing them
whoItsFor.individualsDescription: Turn your dream home into reality or transform your space with the region's most trusted and certified contractors and engineers.
whoItsFor.organizationsDescription: Develop your commercial and industrial projects with confidence using our network of specialized experts in high-quality execution.
whoItsFor.governmentDescription: Execute your development and infrastructure projects efficiently with trusted, government-certified partners and contractors.
whoItsFor.contractorsDescription: Showcase your expertise and discover new projects with guaranteed quality and transparency at every step of your professional journey.
whoItsFor.freelanceEngineersDescription: Connect your technical talents with real opportunities and advance your career in a professional and inspiring environment.
whoItsFor.engineeringOfficesDescription: Expand your business and connect your engineering office with large and diverse projects across the region.
whoItsFor.suppliersDescription: Expand your business reach and connect your construction products and materials with a vast network of contractors and developers.

footer.description: Connecting construction professionals with quality projects and opportunities across the region.
